page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES/MIGRANCY
page.content: KICKING THE BALL PAST THE GOALKEEPER. THE LAST PLAYER TO SCORE A GOAL IS OUT OF THE GAME AND THE REST OF THE PLAYERS GO THROUGH TO THE NEXT ROUND UNTIL YOU HAVE ONLY TWO PLAYERS LEFT AND THEY HAVE TO SCORE TWO GOALS. THE WINNER IS THE ONE WHO HAS SCORED A GOAL IN EVERY ROUND. THE{DISADVANTAGE IS THAT{SOME CHILDREN}GET INTO A{BAD {TEMPER}BECAUSE THEY LOSE. THE {ADVANTAGE}IS THAT IT IS AN{ENJOYABLE AND{SKILFUL}GAME. {FAMILY MOVE TO HIGHAMS PARK}.DAD CAME TO{COLLEGE}FROM A{FARM}IN{YORKSHIRE.} HE{MARRIED}MUM, (A{LOCAL}GIRL) THEY STAYED HERE TO HELP GRANDMA WHO WAS {WIDOWED}SHORTLY AFTER THEIR MARRIAGE. THE GRANDPARENTS HAD MOVED INTO THEIR NEW HOUSE{BECAUSE THEY LIKED THE {COUNTRY}.GRAN STILL CALLS H.P.{"THE {VILLAGE".}MUM AND DAD LIKE LIVING NEAR {EPPING FOREST FOR THE WILDLIFE & WALKS
